attributes.action: Request a referendum for UK citizens to vote on Lockdowns. Accept or reject.
attributes.additional_details: We the people believe that our lives are being shortened and put at risk due to draconian Lockdowns. We should be allowed to decide the outcome of our own safety and health of all of the UK population.
attributes.background: We the people, request UK government put forward a referendum to vote for or against existing and future Lockdowns.
